para.text: A facility shall establish a responsible gaming plan that includes at least the following elements:
Identification of facility personnel responsible for implementation;
Responsibilities of facility personnel identified as responsible for implementation;
Training for facility personnel on problem gambling;
Problem gambling treatment resources, including treatment and prevention programs;
Placement of responsible gambling awareness materials in the facility; and
Any other element required by the Commission.
A facility operator shall submit to the Commission the responsible gaming plan required under §A of this regulation for review and approval.
A facility operator shall submit any amendments to a facility’s responsible gaming plan to the Commission prior to implementation.
A facility operator shall submit to the Commission an annual report describing the operation of the facility’s responsible gaming plan.
